text:
A great mall that has a variety of stores to suit all ages from young kids to the stylish woman. There are various good produce stores such as Cold storage.

Service: 4/5 - good service overall
Atmosphere: 4/5
Food: 4/5 - a few coffee and lunch places

Been coming to Tanglin Mall on and off for some time now, and am always impressed with how brightly it appears. Christmas time is always something to look forward to as the often have special family friendly displays outside the main entrance. Many eateries and retail options here, as well as different studios for the arts. Basement parking is available here. Cold Storage supermarket is wonderful here too.

I really like this mall as itâ€™s having a lot of interior and normal clothes. And itâ€™s a great place for buying your groceries, but a bit expensive. Several cafes and restaurants, food court, opticians, book store and much more. A very friendly mall.

Such a pleasant mall with convenient Thomson line at walkable distance.
Went to the ossea event held there.
